saying: A tiger can't change its stripes.
description: Claudia is a snooty tiger villager in the Animal Crossing series who first appeared in Animal Crossing: New Leaf. Most notably, Claudia is the first female tiger since Bangle to appear in a Animal Crossing series title, which she shares with Bianca. Claudia's name is derived from a "claw", used to refer to the sharp nails of a tiger.
